articles.description: Samsung seems to have big plans as the latest report suggests that the South-Korean tech giant has started developing the smart wearable device Not only that it also suggests that the Galaxy Ring will offer more accurate results compared to the Galaxy watches…
articles.content: Samsung, the South Korean electronics giant, is said to be making progress on its latest wearable device, the Galaxy Ring, which is a smart ring with extensive health monitoring features. According t… [+1881 chars]
